languages.text: "Мы будем думать о свете и связи и жизни. Может, так мы поймем?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Номос отвечает со внезапным упрямством.{/n} "А вот и не уйду! Корабль — это я! Если тебе нравится корабль, значит и я должен нравиться!"

languages.text: "We will think about the light. The connections. Life. Perhaps we will understand then?"
languages.original_text: "Мы будем думать о свете и связи и жизни. Может, так мы поймем?"

traits.locale_text: "We will think about the light. The connections. Life. Perhaps we will understand then?"
"We will think on the light. The connections. Life. Perhaps we will understand then?"
"We will think about the light. The connections. Life. Perhaps we will understand then?"
"We will think about the light. The connections. Life. Perhaps we will understand then?"
"We will think about the light. The connections. Life. Perhaps we will understand then?"
"We will think about the light. The connections. Life. Perhaps we will understand then?"

languages.text: « Nous allons réfléchir à la lumière, aux liens... à la vie. Peut-être cela nous permettra-t-il de comprendre ? »
languages.original_text: "We will think about the light. The connections. Life. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous allons réfléchir à la lumière, aux liens... à la vie. Peut-être cela nous permettra-t-il de comprendre ? »

languages.text: “我们会好好思考光明、链接、生命，或许我们以后会理解吧？”
languages.original_text: "We will think about the light. The connections. Life. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: “我们会好好思考光明、链接、生命，或许我们以后会理解吧？”

languages.text: "Wir werden über das Licht nachdenken. Die Verbindungen. Das Leben. Vielleicht verstehen wir es dann?"
languages.original_text: "We will think about the light. The connections. Life. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden über das Licht nachdenken. Die Verbindungen. Das Leben. Vielleicht verstehen wir es dann?"

languages.text: «Pensaremos sobre la luz. Las conexiones. La vida Quizá así logremos entenderlo».
languages.original_text: "We will think about the light. The connections. Life. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: Pensaremos sobre la luz. Las conexiones. La vida Quizá así logremos entenderlo».

languages.text: 「私たちは光について考える。繋がりについて考える。そうすれば、いつかは理解できるだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "We will think about the light. The connections. Life. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは光について考える。繋がりについて考える。そうすれば、いつかは理解できるだろうか？」

languages.text: "Işığı, bağlantıları, hayatı düşüneceğiz. Belki o zaman anlarız."
languages.original_text: "We will think about the light. The connections. Life. Perhaps we will understand then?"

traits.locale_text: "Işığı düşüneceğiz. Bağlantıları... Hayatı... Belki o zaman anlarız."
